key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities including material shortages, shipping delays, and rising logistics costs
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on construction and industrial sectors
High debt levels from acquisitions raising concerns about financial flexibility
Competitive pressures from manufacturers and private-label brands
controversies: Revenue decline in Q3 2024 due to mixed end-market demand and infrastructure divestiture
Stock underperformance compared to competitors, indicating investor concerns
environmental_issues: Manufacturing processes and product lifecycle posing environmental challenges
Regulatory scrutiny and consumer expectations around sustainability
social_issues: Commitment to sustainability and carbon neutrality by 2030
Privacy and data security concerns related to electronic security solutions
governance_issues: Debt management and financial flexibility concerns
Execution of cost-saving measures and sustainability initiatives
